sect1.title: $security_settings
sect1.para: These are used to override or specify the security settings when $security is enabled. These are the possible settings:

listitem.para: PHP_HANDLING - boolean. If set to &true;, the $php_handling setting is not checked for security.
IF_FUNCS - array. The names of permitted PHP functions in {if} statements.
INCLUDE_ANY - boolean. If set to &true;, any template can be included from the file system, regardless of the $secure_dir list.
MODIFIER_FUNCS - array. The names of permitted PHP functions that can be used as variable modifiers.
